title: "Andy Warhol—From A to B and Back Again" Exhibition Celebration
title_display: Exhibition Celebration: Andy Warhol—From A to B and Back Again
hero_caption: Andy Warhol. Self-Portrait, 1966. Gift of Edlis|Neeson Collection. © 2019 The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc. / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York.
short_description: Sustaining Fellows gather to enjoy a special evening to celebrate this exhibition.
list_description: Enjoy a special evening to celebrate this exhibition with a lecture and following reception.
description:
Enjoy a lively evening celebrating this monumental exhibition with an illuminating lecture followed by a Q&A with Ann Goldstein, deputy director and chair and curator of Modern and Contemporary Art. The evening is complete with a private exhibition viewing and cocktail reception.

Please note that this event is only open to current Sustaining Fellows. Learn more about the Sustaining Fellows here.

Registration is required. Please call (312) 443-3735 or email sustainingfellows@artic.edu for more information.
buy_button_caption:
Registration for this special event is $100 per person.

Registration is required. Please call (312) 443-3735 or email sustainingfellows@artic.edu for more information.
